meanings.definition: The study of the heart and its functions.
meanings.sent1: In cardiologies, researchers investigate how the heart works.
meanings.sent2: Doctors specializing in cardiologies focus on understanding heart functions.
meanings.sent3: Learning about cardiologies can help us appreciate the complexity of our hearts.
meanings.sent4: Exploring cardiologies is like unraveling the mysteries of a beating drum.
meanings.sent5: Studying cardiologies is like peering into the intricate workings of a delicate machine.

meanings.definition: The medical specialty concerned with the diagnosis and treatment of heart diseases.
meanings.sent1: Cardiologies play a crucial role in treating heart conditions.
meanings.sent2: Hospitals often have departments dedicated to cardiologies.
meanings.sent3: A career in cardiologies requires a deep understanding of heart health.
meanings.sent4: The advancements in cardiologies have saved countless lives.
meanings.sent5: Expertise in cardiologies can make a significant impact on patient outcomes.
